questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A person
C) A sign with a motivational message
D) A building

What is written on the sign in the photo?
A) A warning
B) A motivational message
C) A menu
D) A map

What is the message on the sign?
A) "Did you know that your attitude determines your altitude"
B) "Beware of dog"
C) "No trespassing"
D) "Welcome to our park"

What is the background of the photo?
A) A chain-link fence
B) A forest
C) A beach
D) A mountain range

What is depicted on the sign besides text?
A) A drawing of a smiley face
B) A map
C) A photograph
D) A logo

What is the color of the sign?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) Green

What type of writing tool was likely used for the text on the sign?
A) Chalk
B) Paint
C) Marker
D) Pencil

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) The sign
D) A car

What is the sign attached to?
A) A wall
B) A tree
C) A chain-link fence
D) A pole

What is the drawing next to the text on the sign?
A) A tree
B) A house
C) A smiley face
D) A car

What is the sign's message suggesting about attitude?
A) It doesn't matter
B) It determines altitude
C) It should be ignored
D) It is unimportant

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Dark
B) Bright
C) Dim
D) Overcast

What is the position of the sign in the photo?
A) Center
B) Top right
C) Bottom left
D) Top left

What is the main visual element in the photo?
A) The sign
B) The fence
C) The ground
D) The sky

What is the drawing on the sign doing?
A) Pointing
B) Smiling
C) Running
D) Sitting

How is the text on the sign arranged?
A) Horizontally
B) Vertically
C) Diagonally
D) In a circle

What is the chain-link fence made of?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Wood
D) Rope

What is the mood of the drawing on the sign?
A) Happy
B) Sad
C) Angry
D) Confused

What does the sign encourage viewers to do?
A) Change their attitude
B) Follow rules
C) Be cautious
D) Ignore the message

What is the visual contrast in the photo?
A) Light text on a dark background
B) Dark text on a light background
C) Colored text on a white background
D) Text with no background

What is the visual emphasis of the sign?
A) The motivational message
B) The background color
C) The material of the sign
D) The location of the sign

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A crowded event
B) A quiet moment
C) An educational setting
D) An inspirational message on a sign

What color is the fence in the background?
A) Green
B) Blue
C) Silver
D) Red
